description: Minimal consecutive determinant (negated) of n X n persymmetric matrix with entries {-1,0,+1}.
comments: A persymmetric (or Hankel) matrix has M[ i,j ] = M[ i-k,j+k ] for all i and j (matrix is constant along antidiagonals).I would love to find out what "consecutive" means here! Adjacent entries along the top row and right side must be consecutive? - _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 16 2003
author: _Fred Lunnon_, Dec 11 1999
